meanings.sent1: I accidentally tumped over the cup.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to tump the vase on the table.
meanings.sent3: When I tried to move the chair, I managed to tump it over.
meanings.sent4: The wind was so strong that it tumped the umbrella upside down.
meanings.sent5: The playful puppy tumped the bowl of water all over the floor.

meanings.sent1: The children played on the grassy tump in the park.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins were hidden beneath the tump of earth.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel made its home in the cozy tump of leaves.
meanings.sent4: The tump of snow at the end of the driveway was hard to shovel.
meanings.sent5: From the top of the tump, you could see the entire valley below.

meanings.sent1: He received a hard tump on his shoulder during the game.
meanings.sent2: The boxer delivered a powerful tump to his opponent's jaw.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke landed like a light tump on the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected tump to his ego left him speechless.
meanings.sent5: With a swift tump, the bully knocked the hat off the boy's head.
